title: poruL kUra vArumaiyE
sahitya:
poruL kUra vArumaiyE ArumukhanE aDiyEnukku


anupallavi

  tArakat-tilakanAi dhAraNiyil tulangi vEru nigharE  illA sIruDan sirappOnE


caraNam    ODi OivillAmal ODi alaiyum en manam vADi sOrvaDaindu varundiDAdirundiDa
nADiyun tiruvaDiyin nizhalil kiDandu nAn nADum nalam peTru nimmati uTriDa un
